notes.title: Funding
notes.p: We are grateful to the Universities of Reims Champagne Ardenne (France) and Liège (Belgium) for material funds and the doctoral position to Chloë Maes. This research was supported by the Education, Audiovisual and Culture Executive Agency (EACEA), through EOHUB project 600873EPP-1-2018-1ES-EPPKA2-KA. Published with the assistance of the University Foundation of Belgium.
